sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Veterinary Student Loan Repayment Program Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Veterinary Student Loan Repayment Program Act.

sections.heading: Failure to satisfy program agreement
sections.text: Upon the failure of a loan recipient to satisfy the obligations set forth in the program agreement, he or she must repay to the University the amount equal to the amount loaned to the recipient less a prorated amount based on any periods of practice of veterinar

sections.heading: Collected payments. Payments received by the University in accordance with this Act shall be deposited with the University for the purpose of supporting the Program, which shall include providing funding for additional loans as provided for under this Act, and administrative costs associated with ad
sections.text: Collected payments. Payments received by the University in accordance with this Act shall be deposited with the University for the purpose of supporting the Program, which shall include providing funding for additional loans as provided for under this Act, and administrative costs associated with administering the Program.

sections.heading: Expiration of Program. The University may not enter into any program agreement under the Program or the provisions of this Act after July 1, 2019
sections.text: All program agreements entered into prior to July 1, 2019 shall continue in full force and effect, subject to the requirements of this Act.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
